outline:
1. to look out or about, spy, keep watch, observe, watch
    1. (Qal) to keep watch, spy
    2. (Piel) to watch, watch closely
kjv_def: behold, espy, look up (well), wait for, (keep the) watch(-man).
strongs_def: properly, to lean forward, i.e. to peer into the distance; by implication, to observe, await
